ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader simulates a film like grain.
Input: - Front: source clip
Setup: - Amount : how much grain is applied - Size : grain size - Coloured Grain : enables coloured grain - Colour : colour saturation of the grain - Luma : brightness of the grain
Shader developer: martins upitis
Based on http://devlog-martinsh.blogspot.fr/2013/05/image-imperfections-and-film-grain-post.html
